actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families

official_title: To amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to simplify program operations and improve program management under that Act.

summary.text: Amends the Child Nutrition Act (CNA) to eliminate the ten percent limitation on the transfer of State administrative expense funds under CNA and the National School Lunch Act. Extends through FY 2003 the authorization of appropriations for State administrative expenses under CNA.

titles.title: To amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to simplify program operations and improve program management under that Act.
